## SessionManagerOptions.sendDTMFUsingSessionDescriptionHandler property

Send DTMF using the session description handler (uses RFC 2833 DTMF).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendDTMFUsingSessionDescriptionHandler?: boolean;
```
